mapper.insert: insert into db_finding (ID, OPER, CONTENT, OPENFLAG, CATEGORYNAME, RESERVE3, RESERVE2, CREATETIME, RESERVE1, OPERTIME, TASKFLAG, LASTRUNTIME, FLAG, ITEMCOUNT) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{categoryname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{taskflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastruntime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update db_finding set OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CATEGORYNAME = #{categoryname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TASKFLAG = #{taskflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LASTRUNTIME = #{lastruntime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEMCOUNT = #{itemcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, OPER, CONTENT, OPENFLAG, CATEGORYNAME, RESERVE3, RESERVE2, CREATETIME, RESERVE1, OPERTIME, TASKFLAG, LASTRUNTIME, FLAG, ITEMCOUNT from db_finding where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select ID, OPER, CONTENT, OPENFLAG, CATEGORYNAME, RESERVE3, RESERVE2, CREATETIME, RESERVE1, OPERTIME, TASKFLAG, LASTRUNTIME, FLAG, ITEMCOUNT from db_finding
